interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: C.O. Bigelow Shampoo, Lavender Peppermint Shampoo Cleanses & Soothes Hair & Scalp, Luxury Shampoo for Men & Women, 10.4 Fl Oz.
Review Date: 2020/01/30
Store: C. O. Bigelow
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'C. O. Bigelow', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Liquid,Gel', 'Scent': 'Fresh,Lavender,Peppermint', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Package Dimensions': '5.91 x 2.32 x 2.24 inches; 10.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '815691009023'}
Review Text: This shampoo smells great. The scent is very natural, but unfortunately it's not. Rather than using the pricier essential oils of peppermint and lavender, the company uses synthesized fragrance. The lather is decent and washes your hair about as well as any bargain-priced brand from the supermarket shelf. I did notice that it leaves my hair feeling a bit flat. There is no reason for the high price aside from name familiarity, as this brand is used by some hotel chains.
Review Title: Overpriced for What You're Getting
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Butecare Eyelash Growth Enhancer & Brow Serum for Long - Amazon Vine
{'Package Dimensions': '4.5 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
This is my own personal experience with this lash growth enhancer and my own opinion. I did not notice any difference in my lashes since I started using it a month ago. I've documented my experience with pictures every 3 days. I gave it 2 stars and not 1 because I've seen that it's worked for others but I guess it isn't compatible with my biology. I'm  bit disappointed.
Didn't work for me.
Water Flosser Cordless Teeth Cleaner, SOOCAS Professional Oral Irrigator 230ML Portable and Rechargeable Water Dental Flosser with 3 Modes and 4 Jet Tips, IPX7 Waterproof, USB Charged for 30 Days Use
SOOCAS
{'Brand': 'SOOCAS', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Special Feature': 'Por, Multiple Operation Modes, Multiple Tips', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Tank Volume': '230 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 4.41 x 3.23 inches; 1.08 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SOOCAS W3', 'Manufacturer': 'SOOCAS'}
I wasn't expecting my mirror to get a cleaning also! I was excited to finally have a water pick so when I received my package I immediately set it up and studied the directions. Once I was confident, I began and as soon as i turn it on, water went everywhere! It all ricochet ed all oclver my bathroom counter and mirror. Safe to say that you literally need to use this in the shower. But besides that, it has many attachments, different speeds and does a great job!
Messy but works great!
Way Of Will Sweet Orange Body Wash, Moisturizing Body Wash with Sweet Orange Essential Oil, Body Wash for Women and Men, Paraben and Sulfate Free, 120 mL
Way Of Will
{'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'Oily,All Skin Types', 'Brand': 'Way Of Will', 'Scent': 'Sweet Orange', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben,Sulfate Free', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '840652000191'}
This body wash is excellent. The scent is delicious, like real orange, the lather is thick with small bubbles, and it noticeably moisturizes your skin. The only drawback is the price. It's currently listed for $10 for 4 ounces, which is basically travel size.
Excellent Quality Body Wash
BRING GREEN Super Yulmu Pore Deep Cleansing Foam 200ml - Adlay Seed Powder and Clay Contained Exfoliating Rich Foam Cleanser, Remove Dead Skin Cells & Blackeads, Moisturizing Deep Cleanser
BRING GREEN
{'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Brand': 'BRING GREEN', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1'}
I really like the consistency of this face wash. It's like wet clay, with a gentle and pleasant scent. It has just the right amount of lather and it spreads very easily over my face. The only drawback is that is will dry your face out. I suppose this can be countered with a basic facial moisturizer.
Deep Cleaning

C. O. Bigelow

This shampoo smells great. The scent is very natural, but unfortunately it's not. Rather than using the pricier essential oils of peppermint and lavender, the company uses synthesized fragrance. The lather is decent and washes your hair about as well as any bargain-priced brand from the supermarket shelf. I did notice that it leaves my hair feeling a bit flat. There is no reason for the high price aside from name familiarity, as this brand is used by some hotel chains.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interaction:**
  - The user continues to expand their personal care regimen, demonstrating an increasing interest in hair care products alongside their ongoing exploration of skincare solutions. 

- **Experience with Products:**
  - The user approaches product usage with a discerning eye, evaluating not just efficacy but also sensory aspects such as scent and texture. Their recent experience with a shampoo has revealed a preference for natural scents, highlighting a desire for authenticity in fragrance.

- **Satisfaction Level:**
  - Despite expressing enjoyment of the shampoo’s scent, the user also raised concerns about the synthetic nature of the fragrance, indicating a preference for products that utilize natural ingredients. Their mixed review reflects a critical viewpoint on value versus performance, revealing a more cautious satisfaction regarding pricing.

- **Personal Compatibility:**
  - The user remains attentive to ingredient quality, favoring products that align with their health-conscious values. Their skepticism towards high-priced items without evident superiority suggests a thoughtful consideration of cost-benefit ratios in their purchases.

- **Overall Trend:**
  - The user values effective, high-quality products with authentic sensory experiences while maintaining a critical stance towards pricing and ingredient authenticity. Their balanced feedback indicates a commitment to optimizing their grooming routine, blending efficacy, sensory enjoyment, and conscientious consumerism in their personal care choices.
